name: Terrordrome: Reign of the Legends
summary:
Terrordrome – Reign Of The Legends, The first horror fighting game with classic monsters, urban legends and mythological creatures. 
 
Horror icons and urban legends clash in a battle to the death in this original fighting game from the TerrorTeam. Reign Of The Legends explores legends, folklore, myths and the paranormal both in its characters and stages, while incorporating conspiracy theories as the base material for its storyline. Legends and icons are re-imagined in a story set in the present day, continuing the legacy of many of the world’s favorite monsters and cryptids.
